    An introduction to Force-of-Infection (FoI) Models Real-life use cases for serofoi

    Function reference

    All functions

    chagas2012
    Seroprevalence data on serofoi
    chik2015
    Seroprevalence data on serofoi
    extract_seromodel_summary()
    Method to extact a summary of the specified serological model object
    fit_seromodel()
    Function that fits the selected model to the specified seroprevalence survey data
    generate_sim_data()
    Function that generates a simulated serosurvey according to the specified FoI
    get_age_group()
    Method for constructing age-group variable from age column
    get_cohort_ages()
    Function that generates a data.frame containing the age of each cohort corresponding to each birth year exluding the year of the survey.
    get_foi_central_estimates()
    Function that generates the central estimates for the fitted forced FoI
    get_sim_n_seropositive()
    Function that generates a sample of counts of seropositive individuals by sampling from a binomial distribution
    get_sim_probability()
    Function that generates the probabilities of being previously exposed to a pathogen.
    get_table_rhats()
    Method for extracting a dataframe containing the R-hat estimates for a given serological model
    group_sim_data()
    Function that groups a simulated serological dataset by age
    plot_foi()
    Function that generates a Force-of-Infection plot corresponding to the specified fitted serological model
    plot_info_table()
    Function that generates a plot for a given table
    plot_rhats()
    Function that generates a plot of the R-hat estimates of the specified fitted serological model
    plot_seromodel()
    Function that generates a vertical arrange of plots showing a summary of a model, the estimated seroprevalence, the Force-of-Infection fit and the R-hat estimates plots.
    plot_seroprev()
    Function that generates the sero-positivity plot from a raw serological survey dataset
    plot_seroprev_fitted()
    Function that generates a seropositivity plot corresponding to the specified fitted serological model
    prepare_serodata()
    Function that prepares the data from a serological survey for modelling
    run_seromodel()
    Function that runs the specified stan model for the Force-of-Infection and estimates de seroprevalence based on the result of the fit
    serofoi-package serofoi
    The 'serofoi' package.
    simdata_constant
    Constant FoI simulated serosurvey
    simdata_large_epi
    Large epidemic simulated serosurvey
    simdata_sw_dec
    Step-wise decreasing FoI simulated serosurvey
    veev2012
    Seroprevalence data on serofoi

    Developed by Zulma M. Cucunubá, Nicolás T. Domínguez, Ben Lambert, Pierre Nouvellet.
